subject: Clarification regarding Delegation of Power with respect to Operation & Maintenance (O&M) Works in case of the Stretches maintained by NHAI- reg.
text: HRah <cfh rTHRf 9fera5<ut (Tec 4Raa7 &r TTHNf TAR4, HRT TRRAFR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Frqa T 0il-5 Qd 6, 8ae7-10, #Ro5T, Tf fealt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 TM/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Operation & Maintenance/2024 Policy Circular No.9.4.30/2024 dated O9th December,,2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. 14555 (Comp. No. 171141)} Sub: Clarification regarding Delegation of Power with respect to Operation & Maintenance (O8M) Works in case of the Stretches maintained by NHAI- reg: NHAI through Policy Circular No. 209/2016 dated 02.08.2016,further amended vide Policy Circular No. 18.24/2017 dated 21.08.2017, Policy Circular No. 18.41/2020 dated 15.04.2020 and Policy Circular No. 9.4.24/2022 dated 13.05.2022 issued Delegation of Power in respect of (i) Sanction, (ii) Approval of Bids for Operation & Maintenance (O&M) Works for (4/6 lane) Stretches maintained by NHAI, (iii) Variation in BOQ/ Non-BOQ items and (iv) Extension of Time (EOT): The consolidated Delegation of Powers for O&M Works is enclosed at Annexure-1_ 2_ Further, NHAI vide Policy Circular No. 18.91/2023 dated 03.11.2023 issued Delegation of Power to Regional Officers to decide on COS and EOT subject to conditions mentioned therein for the Works Sanctioned & Bids invited by ROs relating to rectification of Blackspots identified by MoRTH, Maintenance of Highways, Risk & Cost Works etc. 3_ It has been observed that some Technical Divisions have approached EC vide Agenda Item No. 614.07 & 627.19 for decision regarding Variation & EOT Proposals for O&M Contracts in accordance with NHAI Policy Circular No. 18.91/2023 dated 03.11.2023_ EC has decided that for O&M  Works, Delegation of Powers as per  Policy Circular dated 02.08.2016 along with its amendments (as mentioned at Annexure-1) shall apply. 4_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1_ Hindi Division for translation in Hindi: 2.
